evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Plaintiff Association for Education Finance and Policy (AEFP) is a nonprofit membership organization incorporated under Florida law, with a principal place of business in Sparks, Nevada.

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Plaintiff the Institute for Higher Education Policy (IHEP) is a nonpartisan, nonprofit research, policy, and advocacy organization that is committed to promoting postsecondary access and success for all students.
